scripts.build: npm run build:third_party && npm run build:core
scripts.build:cwc: npm run build:cwc-deps && npm run build:cwc-main
scripts.build:cwc-debug: npm run build:cwc-deps && npm run build:cwc-main-debug
scripts.build:cwc-deps: npm run build:cwc-blocks && npm run build:cwc-frameworks && npm run build:cwc-gss && npm run build:cwc-locales && npm run build:cwc-soy && npm run build:cwc-static-files && npm run build:cwc-tutorials
scripts.build:cwc-raw: npm run build:cwc-deps && npm run build:cwc-main-raw
scripts.build:external: npm run build:external-frameworks && npm run build:external-extra && npm run build:external-static
scripts.build:framework-files: npm run build:external-frameworks && npm run build:cwc-frameworks
scripts.build:third_party: npm run build:external-frameworks && npm run build:external-extra && npm run build:external-static
scripts.chrome-app: npm run build:core && npm run build:cwc-main && npm run build:chrome_app && npm run launch
scripts.chrome-app-debug: npm run build:core && npm run build:cwc-main-debug && npm run build:chrome_app && npm run launch
scripts.clean: npm run clean:npm && npm run clean:chrome_app && npm run clean:nw_app && npm run clean:web_app && npm run clean:core && npm run clean:soy_files && npm run clean:test && npm run clean:third_party
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean:chrome_app: echo Cleaning up Chrome app dist files. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/chrome_os/* && rimraf dist/cwc-chrome_app.zip
scripts.clean:core: echo Cleaning up core genfiles. Please wait ... && rimraf genfiles/core/*
scripts.clean:gss_files: echo Cleaning gss genfiles. Please wait ... && rimraf genfiles/core/css/editor.css
scripts.clean:npm: echo Cleaning up npm files. Please wait ... && npm prune
scripts.clean:nw_app: echo Cleaning up NW.js app dist files. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/nw_app/* && rimraf dist/binary/*
scripts.clean:nw_app-linux: echo Cleaning up NW.js Linux app. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/binary/linux32 && rimraf dist/binary/linux64
scripts.clean:nw_app-mac: echo Cleaning up NW.js Mac app. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/binary/osx64
scripts.clean:nw_app-win: echo Cleaning up NW.js Win app. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/binary/win32 && rimraf dist/binary/win64
scripts.clean:soy_files: echo Cleaning up soy genfiles. Please wait ... && rimraf gensoyfiles/*
scripts.clean:test: echo Cleaning up test genfiles. Please wait ... && rimraf test/genfiles/*
scripts.clean:third_party: echo Cleaning up third_party genfiles. Please wait ... && rimraf genfiles/third_party/*
scripts.clean:web_app: echo Cleaning up Web app dist files. Please wait ... && rimraf dist/web_app/*
scripts.launch: echo Lauching app. Please wait ... && npm run launch:linux --silent || npm run launch:mac --silent || npm run launch:win-experimental --silent
scripts.lint: npm run lint-javascript && npm run lint-markdown
scripts.nw-app: npm run build:core && npm run build:nw_app && npm run launch:nw
scripts.nw-app-debug: npm run build:core && npm run build:nw_app_debug && npm run launch:nw
scripts.pretest:core: npm run build && npm run build:cwc-main
scripts.pretest:core-mode: npm run build && npm run build:cwc-main
scripts.pretest:mode: npm run build && npm run build:cwc-main
scripts.publish:chrome_app: npm run publish:prepare && npm run build:chrome_app && bestzip dist/cwc-chrome_app.zip dist/chrome_os/
scripts.publish:nw_app: npm run publish:nw_app-win && npm run publish:nw_app-linux && npm run publish:nw_app-mac
scripts.publish:prepare: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:cwc-main
scripts.sync: echo Syncing. Please wait ... && git pull && git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run update
scripts.test: npm run test:block && npm run test:soy && npm run test:units && npm run test:core-mode
scripts.test:block: echo Starting block tests ... && karma start test/block_tests.conf
scripts.test:core: echo Starting core tests ... && karma start test/core_tests.conf
scripts.test:core-mode: echo Starting combined core and mode tests ... && karma start test/core_tests.conf && karma start test/mode_tests.conf
scripts.test:mode: echo Starting mode tests ... && karma start test/mode_tests.conf
scripts.test:soy: echo Starting soy tests ... && karma start test/soy_tests.conf
scripts.test:units: echo Starting unit tests ... && karma start test/unit_tests.conf
scripts.update: npm install && npm update -a && npm audit fix && npm dedupe
scripts.web-app: npm run build:core && npm run build:cwc-main && npm run build:web_app && npm run launch:web
scripts.web-app-debug: npm run build:core && npm run build:cwc-main-debug && npm run build:web_app && npm run launch:web
